__e: You won, you were robbed and now we have nothing.
He's cleaned us out, and, uh, we don't know where he is.
The bitch that was doing all the talking, she said that this man of hers said that he robbed a bank, and, honey, all hell broke loose.
We don't think he was robbed, but we couldn't find his phone.
All right, look, the reason that I don't have any money on me is because I got mugged.
Maybe you'll have better luck with the other fella who got mugged.
The woman he robbed, is she okay?
Then tell us if you see the man who robbed your store.
Let's say your brother or your cousin gets arrested because he looks like someone who robbed a store, but it wasn't him.
What, he been stuck up again?
I almost got mugged once. The only reason why the guy didn't attack me is that I looked so pathetic.
Tell him they were stolen along the way by his men. [Ital.]
Anyone that might have robbed the store to get it back?
I don't recall you ever robbing a bank in Smallville.
They'll probably understand. She was dead anyway. Why not rob her?
